A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being a huge Star Wars fan I feel let down. The plot was barey good. They disgraced Luke's character\, Rey still doesn't have a good back story\, rose and fin storyline wasn't needed. Ren's is still a big baby when they could have developed him better.  Snoke was a huge disappointment. He should have been a lot better character.  No questions answered on him. Like who is he\, how he got the first order started. I could go on and on.  I left the theatre dissatisfied
